articles.title: PIS-MIL (1-1): Allegri brings in Pulisic, Athekame comes out
articles.summary: In the 77th minute of Pisa-Milan, 1-1 partial, Mister Allegri brought on Christian Pulisic in place of Athekame. Rossoneri who switch to a four-man rearguard with Tomori and Bartesaghi as full-backs.

articles.title: LIVE MN - Pisa-Milan (1-1): 10 plus added time at the end. Pulisic, Leao and Fullkug are now on the pitch
articles.summary: 77' | Pulisic enters for Athekame. Pulisic, Leao and Fullkrug are now on the pitch.

articles.title: PIS-MIL (1-1): incredible rebound, Loyola equalizer. Leao and Ricci enter
articles.summary: Pisa equalized in the 71st minute with Loyola.

articles.title: PIS-MIL (0-1): Fullkrug misses the penalty, the post goes out
articles.summary: Bad mistake by Fullkrug from the spot in the 56th minute. Penalty earned by Pavlovic with a sortie of his own in the penalty area, then brought down by an opponent.

articles.title: PIS-MIL (0-1): a beautiful goal from Rabiot was canceled due to a hand from Fullkrug
articles.summary: Rabiot's goal was disallowed in the first minutes of the second half of Pisa-Milan: a shame, because it was a beautiful goal.

articles.title: PIS-MIL (0-1): first substitution for Allegri. An impalpable Nkunku out for Fullkrug
articles.summary: During the interval of Pisa-Milan, partial 0-1, Mister Allegri made the first substitution of the match: an impalpable Nkunku out and Niclas Fullkrug in.

articles.title: Bartesaghi at half-time: "Difficult match, we must continue to find the right spaces"
articles.summary:
Davide Bartesaghi spoke to DAZN at half-time of Pisa-Milan 0-1

How important is it for the attackers to enter the area for you who have to deliver crosses from the wing?

"It's something important, he asked us...

articles.title: Pisa-Milan, the match scoreboard at the end of the first half

articles.title: Pisa-Milan (0-1). Comment on the first half: Rossoneri slow, but ahead thanks to Loftus-Cheek
articles.summary: Bad first half for Milan, with a team that was slow, composed and often prone to technical errors.

articles.title: Watch: Loftus-Cheek scores in second straight game to give Milan the lead in Pisa
articles.summary: Ruben Loftus-Cheek got on the scoresheet for the second straight game for AC Milan, giving them the lead against Pisa. Somewhat against the run of play at the Arena Garibaldi, Milan got themselves in front just over six minutes before the break and it came from Loftus-Cheek, who repaid Massimiliano

articles.title: Are Nkunku and Loftus the ones who give the most guarantees? Allegri: "We'll see it at the end of the match..."
articles.summary:
Massimiliano Allegri spoke to DAZN before Pisa-Milan.

Pulisic, Leao and Fullkrug on the bench... Do Nkunku and Loftus give more guarantees?

“We'll see if they're better and give more guarantees after the match (laughs, ed.).

articles.title: PIS-MIL (0-1): Loftus unlocks it! Great cross from Athekame
articles.summary: MILAN GOAL! Loftus-Cheek unlocks Pisa-Milan in the 39th minute with a great header! The Englishman's first entry into the area and the Rossoneri's goal arrives.

articles.title: Allegri: "Inter? We just need to score as many points as possible, first and foremost for our objective which is the Champions League"
articles.summary:
Massimiliano Allegri spoke to DAZN before Pisa-Milan. 

Do you want to reach the derby with 5 points behind you?

“I believe there is very little that can be done.

articles.title: Allegri shakes Fofana: "Wake up, you've touched a ball so far!". And send Ricci to warm up
articles.summary: After the outburst with Loftus-Cheek Allegri also went to pick up Fofana, who in these first 25 minutes of Pisa-Milan often lost the ball while managing it.

articles.title: Pisa-Milan, Allegri furious with Loftus-Cheek: "He's walking!"
articles.summary: Not an easy start to the match for Milan in Pisa. Hiljemark's team is closing very well in this start to the match and Milan's pace doesn't help: the Rossoneri's maneuver is slow and predictable.

articles.title: Bazzani: "Having those two arrows there, Pulisic and Leao, to put into the ongoing match is an added value"
articles.summary: Milan goes to Pisa with Pulisic and Leao starting from the bench, with Allegri starting Loftus and Nkunku in attack from the first minute.

articles.title: Compagnoni: "If two months ago someone had said Nkunku-Loftus couple, they would have told him to put the fiasco down"
articles.summary: Today, Milan takes the field in Pisa ten days after their last match in Serie A Enilive.

articles.title: Hiljemark has happy memories of facing Milan, wants ‘aggressive’ Pisa

articles.title: Marcolin: "Athekame is growing, thanks to Allegri who gets into the head"
articles.summary: Thanks to Saelemaekers' injury, Zachary Athekame is also a starter this evening in Pisa-Milan. The Swiss scored the first and only goal in the Rossoneri shirt in the first leg for the final 2-2.

articles.title: Pisa-Milan, no surprises about the captain. Cage the deputy
articles.summary: No surprise, Milan's captain for the match against Pisa is Mike Maignan. The deputy, with Leao starting on the bench, is Matteo Gabbia.

articles.title: Athekame to MTV: "Replacing Saelemaekers is not easy, but there are several players who are ready"
articles.summary: Zacahary Athekame, AC Milan defender, spoke to MilanTV before Pisa-Milan: "The team is doing well. The match will be difficult, but we are ready.
